p: For RNAi assays, H1R or H2R On-Target plus Smart pool small interfering RNA (siRNA; Dharmacon) or negative control siRNA (50 nM) were delivered using the DharmaFECT transfection reagent as recommended by the manufacturer. At 48 h post-transfection, the cells were induced by Dox (0.5 μg/mL) in combination with histamine (100 μM) for additional 48 h, then protein expression was measured by Western blot.
